summary:
Chima possesses more than 20 years combined experience in the professional, pastoral, research and academic sectors. Has extensive fieldwork and research experience in 15 African countries. Has served as chaplain and volunteer in many parishes, care homes and hospitals in the Netherlands. Has designed, taught and supervised broad courses in  International Relations, International Political Economy, Democracy Studies, Migration, Security, Political Science, Research Methodology, Conflict and Peace Studies. Has an extensive management experience of over 10 years with exposure to executive/middle management positions as Director, Adviser and Coordinator in diverse organizations. Has experience in multicultural and international settings and has partnered with diverse organizations, religious groups and government agencies in Africa and Europe on issues of human rights, democracy and elections, pastoral work, migration, development and training projects. Possesses excellent communication skills, prominent level of initiative, flexibility and attention for details. Can present results in a clear format for both academic and non-academic audiences. Leverages on acquired practical, professional, pastoral, teaching and versatile experiences of several years to creatively provide solutions to opportunities issues.

profile_positions.description:
Served as an expert on political parties and elections for IFES and IRI in Nigeria, and further:  
•	provided seminars, workshops and trainings for political party officials and executives on internal 
        democracy, party management, finance, regulations and administration; 
•	drafted manual for election observation for political parties officials; 
•	liaised between the Electoral Commission of Nigeria and IFES/IRI in the harmonization of Manuals 
        to monitor election related conflicts and corruption cases in Nigeria
•	developed the strategic intiative and training programme for the first ever inclusion and 
        participation of the physically challenged-persons in the electoral and voting processes in Nigeria.
•	designed and produced the first development-partner funded "Electoral and Civic Education 
        Digital Library" - intended for documentation and research on electoral process in Nigeria.
